summary: The son of a murderer is entangled in his father's crimes and is sentenced to a rehabilitive farm, where he learns a new way of life.
cast: Edward Arnold|Lionel Barrymore|Marsha Hunt|Robert Sterling|Gene Reynolds|Emma Dunn|Veda Ann Borg|Richard Lane|Gloria DeHaven|Grant Mitchell|Phil Silvers|Warren Ashe|William Haade|Ralph Byrd|Edgar Barrier|Fay Holden|King Baggot|William Bailey|John Butler|Ken Christy|Joe Devlin|Mimi Doyle|Byron Foulger|Fred Graham|Al Hill|Paul Kruger|Ethan Laidlaw|William Lally|George Lynn|Alonzo Price|Don Rowan|Tim Ryan|Gus Schilling|Brick Sullivan|William Tannen|Harry Tenbrook|Charles Wagenheim
title: The Penalty
